metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24698 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in PowerDNS Authoritative through 4.3.0 when--enable-experimental-gss-tsig is used. A remote, unauthenticated attackermight be able to cause a double-free, leading to a crash or possiblyarbitrary code execution. by sending crafted queries with a GSS-TSIGsignature.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
